response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product offers unparalleled features and benefits that we believe will be invaluable to you. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am offering it to you for $12,000. I understand that the value of this product may vary based on your specific requirements and goals, so please consider this offer as a starting point for us to discuss and potentially adjust to better suit your needs. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to ask. I look forward to the possibility of providing you with a solution that will enhance your experience.", "product_price": 12000}
